'''House Marsh''' is a vassal house from [[the Neck]]. They are sworn to [[House Reed]] of [[Greywater Watch]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Marsh are crannogmen sworn to House Reed. Their sigil is ten green frogs, 4-3-2-1, on yellow.
sections.Members: * [[Bowen Marsh]], currently aÂ [[First Steward]] of the [[Night's Watch]].
